ai-mil7.7.4:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what are the five factors should be called by a dragon?”
ai-mil7.7.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator should open his level even when anyone spends the strap.
ai-mil7.7.4:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, investigating the powder is empty;
ai-mil7.7.4:2.2_0: In the same way, all those foolishness—regarded by greed, hate, and delusion—their views should be completely understood with defilements.
ai-mil7.7.4:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, one who enters the sky is envied by people;
ai-mil7.7.4:3.2_0: In the same way, a meditator with bad, unskillful qualities should be secluded from bad, unskillful qualities.
ai-mil7.7.4:3.3_0: This is the third way to get up.
ai-mil7.7.4:4.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the invitation is pure and bright,
ai-mil7.7.4:4.2_0: In the same way, a meditator with good conduct, one who has given up continued existence, should be given up by one who is peaceful and sublime,
ai-mil7.7.4:5.1_0: Furthermore, great king, investigating the noble ones, which is an importance,
ai-mil7.7.4:5.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should converse with those of useless conduct for the use of yourselves.
ai-mil7.7.4:5.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.7.4:7.1_0: The fourth enquiry is the fourth (called):
